tasks.title: Catch 6 Pokemon
tasks.details: Catch at least 6 Pokemon in Kanto region.

tasks.title: Get The Boulder Badge
tasks.details: Get the first badge from the gym leader Brock (Optional: Be friends with him later...).

tasks.title: Catch All Of The Kanto Starters
Get Pikachu Into A Pokeball
tasks.details: Get my best buddy into a pokeball because of the reason that it is too heavy to carry on my shoulders. (Probably will not do it, maybe just delete the task?)
